resources.string: The Gamma Calibration will revert back to the factory default settings. Do you want to continue?
All Color Tuner settings will be reset back to the default values. Continue?
All Two Point values will be reset back to the default. Continue?
All Twenty Point values will be reset back to the default. Continue?
All current picture settings will revert to the factory default. Do you want to continue?
The current sound mode settings will revert back to the factory default settings. Do you want to continue?
TV will be turned off in 30s
TV will be turn off automatically, press any key to cancel
TV will be turn off in 15s
TV will be turn off at
Auto Channel Scan is not completed.
Erase all your personal information and downloaded apps? You can\'t reverse this action!
Auto Channel Scan will clear all installed channels. Continue?
Start Auto Channel Scan for Cable and Antenna channels.
Now there is no channel information. Please scan channels.
Learn how to use the remote control to access convenient Live TV functions.
Press the UP button to view channel and program information
Press the OK button to view Channel List
Press the MENU button to configure settings of broadcast TV.
Onscreen menu shows functions about audio only, picture mode, sound mode and subtitle etc.
Press the BACK button to return to the channel last viewed.
Info bar shows channel number, channel name, program name, play progress, the next program, more info of current program, and program indicator that includes subtitle and resolution etc.
Channel list shows channel number, channel name, program name. It gives you access to the channel management and your favorite lists.
Onscreen menu shows functions about audio only, picture mode, sound mode and subtitle etc.
Press [Back] to jump to previous channel
Electronic program guide shows program information in the future. User can initiate a PVR or reminder coming program within EPG.
Press [DOWN] to initiate PVR Press [DOWN] to initiate Timeshift
Initiate live recording or time shift to watch your program after live broadcasting.
You haven\'t added a favorite channel. You can add favorite channels by pressing green key in All channel list, to create a convenient channel list.
Selected language is not Primary Audio Language, do you want to set it to Primary Audio Language?
Please check your input source connection.If you are using a connected cable then go to Menu>Channels and run an automatic channel scan.
Check your input connection and make sure your device is on.
Channel is not available in list
After disabling this feature the TV device won\'t be anymore able to keep your channel list automatically updated with respect to services on-air.
It will take several minutes to search channels.
Do you want to save the search result?
Firmware is ready. Are you sure to \nreboot system now?
Please press start button to download firmware!
Download Exit! The download file is not exist!
The system not do upgrade firmware!
The system do upgrade firmware successfully!
The system do upgrade firmware unsuccessfully!
This feature is only available for DTV stream
The CI+ module/CA module and smart card are not inserted.
Press OK button here to open keyboard
Failed to detect external storage device.
Detecting external hard drive, please wait.
Please delete existing time and input right time!
Press Left/Right button to adjust the available size.
The available space of the USB is less than 1G
Exit the playback of recorded video?
Recording is completed, you can enter Media to review record files.
Are you sure you wish to delete the selected items?
Move or delete the channel in focus or press [OK] to select more channels
Move or delete the chosen channel(s) or select more
Use Up/Down to move the blue cursor and confirm with OK
The storage space is insufficient, whether to delete recorded files?
Are you sure you want to delete this channel? And you can restore it in deleted channel list with red key.
Are you sure you want to remove this channel?
